Package io.micronaut.jackson.annotation

Annotation Interface JacksonFeatures

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({ANNOTATION_TYPE,TYPE}) public @interface JacksonFeatures
Annotation that can be applied to types that use Jackson to customize serialization features.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
